|blank_name = |blank_info = |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Doba''' is a city in [[Chad]], the capital of the [[regions of Chad|region]] of [[Logone Oriental Region|Logone Oriental]]. Exploitation of [[Petroleum|oil]] resources in the vicinity of Doba is expected to produce economic benefits. The town is served by [[Doba Airport]]. ==Demographics== {| class="wikitable" ! Year ! Population<ref>[http://bevoelkerungsstatistik.de/wg.php?x=&men=gcis&lng=de&dat=32&geo=-205&srt=pnan&col=aohdq&pt=c&va=x World Gazetteer: Chad]</ref> |- | 1993 | 17 920 |- | 2008 | 25 650 |} ==References== {{reflist}} {{Chad-geo-stub}} [[Category:Logone Oriental Region]] [[Category:Populated places in Chad]]
